gate.composite.impl

Class CombineMembersPR

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractProcessingResource
          • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
            • gate.composite.impl.CombineMembersPR
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ANNIEConstants, gate.Executable, gate.LanguageAnalyser, gate.ProcessingResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable

    public class CombineMembersPR
extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
implements gate.ProcessingResource
    A PR that allows combining members of a compound document. The newly created document is an instance of composite document, which becomes another member of the compound document.
    Author:
    niraj
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • combiningMethod

        protected String combiningMethod
        Name of the combining method class that is used for combining the documents.

      • parameters

        protected String parameters
        Other accompanying parameters used for the combining method. It must follow the following format. param1=value;param2=value;

        protected CombiningMethod combiningMethodInst
